SMSConvUtil Class Reference

Conversion routines for the GSM 03.38 character set. More...

#include <SMSConvUtil.h>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

  • int gsmToIso (char *outBuffer, const char *inBuffer, int dataSize)
    Converts the string from GSM characters to ISO Outbuffer should be three times as large as inbuffer.
  • int isoToGsm (char *outBuffer, const char *inBuffer, int dataSize)
    Converts the string from ISO character encoding to GSM.
  • int gsmToUtf8 (char *outBuffer, const char *inBuffer, int dataSize)
    Converts the string from GSM characters to ISO, then to UTF8.
  • int utf8ToGsm (char *outBuffer, const char *inBuffer, int dataSize)
    Converts the string from UTF8 to ISO character encoding to GSM.
  • int gsmToMc2 (char *outBuffer, const char *inBuffer, int dataSize)
    Converts the string from GSM characters to MC2.
  • int mc2ToGsm (char *outBuffer, const char *inBuffer, int dataSize)
    Converts the string from MC2 character encoding to GSM.

Detailed Description

Conversion routines for the GSM 03.38 character set.

TODO: Properly convert the escaped characters. TODO: Convert latin-1 to utf-8, not the opposit.

Member Function Documentation

int SMSConvUtil::gsmToIso (  char *  outBuffer,
const char *  inBuffer,
int  dataSize
)  [static]
 

Converts the string from GSM characters to ISO Outbuffer should be three times as large as inbuffer.

N.B! Some characters don't exist in both formats and will be converted to spaces.

Parameters:
outBuffer Buffer to put the result into.
inBuffer Buffer to read from.
length The length of the in-buffer.
Returns:
Number of characters placed in the out-buffer.

int SMSConvUtil::gsmToMc2 (  char *  outBuffer,
const char *  inBuffer,
int  dataSize
)  [static]
 

Converts the string from GSM characters to MC2.

Outbuffer should be three times as large as inbuffer. N.B! Some characters don't exist in both formats and will be converted to spaces.

Parameters:
outBuffer Buffer to put the result into.
inBuffer Buffer to read from.
length The length of the in-buffer.
Returns:
Number of characters placed in the out-buffer.

int SMSConvUtil::gsmToUtf8 (  char *  outBuffer,
const char *  inBuffer,
int  dataSize
)  [static]
 

Converts the string from GSM characters to ISO, then to UTF8.

Outbuffer should be three times as large as inbuffer. N.B! Some characters don't exist in both formats and will be converted to spaces.

Parameters:

inBuffer Buffer to read from.
length The length of the in-buffer.
Returns:
Number of characters placed in the out-buffer.

int SMSConvUtil::utf8ToGsm (  char *  outBuffer,
const char *  inBuffer,
int  dataSize
)  [static]
 

Converts the string from UTF8 to ISO character encoding to GSM.

Outbuffer should be three times as large as inbuffer. N.B! Some characters don't exist in both formats and will be converted to spaces.

inBuffer The buffer to read from.
length The length of the in-buffer.
